analyzed: aṭṭhārasa tāḥ eva ajjhattikassa upādāya aṭṭhārasa bāhirassa upādāya aṭṭhārasā ati chattiṃsa

original: tā atīte chattiṃsa, anāgate chattiṃsa, paccuppanne chattiṃsāti evaṃ aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritānīti.
analyzed: tāḥ atīte chattiṃsa anāgate chattiṃsa paccuppanne chattiṃsā ati evam aṭṭhasata taṇhā vicaritāni iti

original: Māretīti māro, pamādo “pamādo maccuno pada”nti vacanato. Sammāājīvavināsanato vā
analyzed: māra iti iti māro pamādo pamādaḥ vacanataḥ sammāājīva vināsanataḥ vā

original: kilesā vuccanti “māro”ti, vadhakūpamattā khandhāva mārā. Abhisaṅkhārā jātidukkhābhinibbattāpanato,

original: jātassa jarādisambhavato ca mārā. Ekabhavapariyāpannajīvitamāraṇato maccu māro. Aṇimatā

original: nāma paramāṇu viya adassanūpagamanaṃ. Laghimatā sarīrena, cittena vā sīghagamanaṃ.
analyzed: nāma paramāṇu viya adassana upagamanam laghimatā sarīrena cittena vā sīgha gamanam

original: Mahimatā candimasūriyādīnampipāṇinā parāmasanādi. Patti nāma yathicchitadesappatti.
analyzed: mahimatā parāmasana ādi patti nāma yathicchita desa ppatti

original: Pakāsanatā, lābhakassatthasādhanaṃ vā pākammaṃ. Īsattaṃ nāma sayaṃvasitā. Vasittaṃ
analyzed: pakāsana tā lābhakassattha sādhanam vā pākammam īsattam nāma sayaṃvasi tā vasittam

original: nāma aparavasitā. Yatthakāmāvasāyitaṃ nāma yatthicchati yadicchati yāvadicchati,
analyzed: nāma aparavasitā yattha kāmāvasāyitam nāma yatth icchati yat icchati yāvat icchati

original: tattha tāva tadatthasādhanaṃ. Pīḷanasaṅkhatasantāpavipariṇāmaṭṭhena vā dukkhamariyasaccantiādimhi
analyzed: tattha tāva tad attha sādhanam pīḷana saṅkhata santāpa vipariṇāma ṭṭhena vā

original: idaṃ codanāpubbaṅgamaṃ atthavissajjanaṃ – dukkhādīnaṃ aññepi rūpataṇhādayo atthā

analyzed: atthi atha kasmā cattāro eva vuttā ati ce añña sacca dassana vasena āvi bhāvato

original: “Tattha katamaṃ dukkheñāṇaṃ, dukkhaṃ ārabbha yā uppajjati paññā”tiādināpi nayena

original: ekekasaccārammaṇavasenāpi saccañāṇaṃ vuttaṃ. “Yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi

original: so passatī”tiādinā nayena ekaṃ saccaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā sesesu kiccanipphattivasenāpi
analyzed: so passati iti ādinā nayena ekam saccam ārammaṇam katvā sesesu kicca nipphatti vasena api

analyzed: vuttam tattha yadā ekekam saccam ārammaṇam karoti tadā samudaya dassanena tāva sabhāvato

analyzed: pīḷana lakkhaṇassa api dukkhassa yasmā tam āyūhana lakkhaṇena samudayena āyūhitam saṅkhatam

original: tasmāssa so saṅkhataṭṭho āvi bhavati. Yasmā pana maggo kilesasantāpaharo susītalo,

original: tasmāssa maggadassanena santāpaṭṭho āvi bhavati nandassa accharādassanena sundariyā

original: anabhirūpabhāvo viya. Avipariṇāmadhammassa pana nirodhassa dassanena tassa vipariṇāmaṭṭho
analyzed: anabhirūpa bhāvaḥ viya a vipariṇāma dhammassa pana nirodhassa dassanena tassa vipariṇāma ṭṭho

original: āvi bhavatīti vattabbameva natthi. Sabhāvato āyūhanalakkhaṇassapi samudayassa dukkhadassanena
analyzed: āvi bhavati iti vattabbam eva natthi sabhāvataḥ āyūhana lakkhaṇassa api samudayassa dukkha dassanena

original: nidānaṭṭho āvi bhavati asappāyabhojanato uppannabyādhidassanena bhojanassa byādhinidānabhāvo
analyzed: nidāna aṭṭhaḥ bhavati asappāya bhojanataḥ uppanna byādhi dassanena bhojanassa byādhi nidāna bhāvaḥ

original: viya. Visaṃyogabhūtassa nirodhassa dassanena saṃyogaṭṭho. Niyyānabhūtassa ca maggassa
analyzed: viya visaṃyoga bhūtassa nirodhassa dassanena saṃyoga ṭṭhaḥ niyyāna bhūtassa ca maggassa

original: dassanena palibodhaṭṭhoti. Tathā nissaraṇassāpi nirodhassa avivekabhūtassa samudayassa
analyzed: dassanena palibodha ṭṭho ti tathā nissaraṇassa api nirodhassa aviveka bhūtassa samudayassa

analyzed: saṃsāre maggaḥ na diṭṭha pubbaḥ saḥ api ca sappaccaya ttā saṅkhataḥ evā ti appaccaya dhammassa

original: asaṅkhatabhāvo ativiya pākaṭo hoti. Dukkhadassanena panassa amataṭṭho āvi bhavati.
analyzed: asaṅkhata bhāvaḥ ativiya pākaṭaḥ hoti dukkha dassanena panassa amata ṭṭho āvi bhavati

original: Dukkhañhi visaṃ, amataṃ nibbānanti. Tathā niyyānalakkhaṇassāpi maggassa samudayadassanena
analyzed: dukkham hi visam amatam nibbānanti tathā niyyāna lakkhaṇassa api maggassa samudaya dassanena

analyzed: dassana ṭṭhaḥ parama sukhuma rūpāni passataḥ vippasannam vata me cakkhu iti cakkhussa

original: vippasannabhāvo viya. Dukkhadassanena adhipateyyaṭṭho anekarogāturakapaṇajanadassanena

analyzed: issara janassa uḷāra bhāvaḥ viyāti evam ettha lakkhaṇa vasena ekassa añña sacca dassana vasena

original: Paṭipakkhaṃ atthayantīti paccatthikā. Pati viruddhā amittā paccāmittā. Sacchikatvā

analyzed: karuṇā sampattim dīpetum saḥ dhammam desesi iti ādim āha atha vā kim so pavedesi iti

original: Ñāṇaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ tilokahitabhūtameva. So dhammaṃ desesīti kīdisaṃ? “Ādikalyāṇa”ntiādi.
analyzed: ñāṇam tat sabbam tiloka hita bhūtam eva so dhammam desesi iti kīdisam ādi kalyāṇa ntiādi

original: Anena vacanena vattuṃ arahabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Sāsanadhammoti ovādapariyatti. Kiccasuddhiyāti
analyzed: anena vacanena vattum araha bhāvam dīpeti sāsana dhammaḥ ti ovāda pariyatti kicca suddhiyā ati

original: navakoṭisahassānītiādikaṃ vā. Maggameva brahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ. Tassa pakāsakaṃ

original: saṅkāsanaṃ. Ādito kāsanaṃ pakāsanaṃ. Ubhayampi vitthāretvā desanaṃ vivaraṇaṃ. Puna
analyzed: saṅkāsanam āditas kāsanam pakāsanam ubhayam pi vitthāretvā desanam vivaraṇam punar

analyzed: vibhāga karaṇam vibhajanam opamma ādinā pākaṭa karaṇam uttānīkaraṇam citta paritosa jananena

analyzed: citta nisānena ca paññāpanam veditabbam byañjana padesu akkharaṇataḥ akkharam eka akkhara padam akkharanti

original: Akkharehi vā saṅkāsayitvā padehi pakāseti, byañjanehi vivaritvā ākārehi vibhajati,
analyzed: akkharehi vā saṅkāsayitvā padehi pakāseti byañjanehi vivaritvā ākārehi vibhajati

analyzed: niruttīhi uttānim katvā niddesehi paññāpeti akkharehi vā ugghāṭetvā padehi vineti

analyzed: sakaḥ sakaḥ bhāvaḥ paṭivedhaḥ nāma tam ubhayam pi atthaḥ nāma tena vuttam attha gambhīra tā paṭivedha gambhīra tāhi

original: viya “rūparasā”ti vuccanti. Tathāgatassa pahīnāti adhikāravasenāha. Tathāgatassapi
analyzed: rūpa rasā ati vuccanti tathāgatassa pahīnā ati adhikāra vasena āha tathāgatassa api

original: hi kassaci te pahīnāti matthakacchinnatālo viya katā. Kathaṃ? Rūparasādivacanena

analyzed: chinna ttā āyatim tāla panti sadise vipāka kkhandhe nibbattetum asamatthā jātā tasmā

analyzed: kāma rāga ṭṭhāniyā catutthena an abhāvaṃka tā rūpa rāga arūpa rāga ṭṭhāniyā a parihāna dhamma tat

original: jhānassa pubbabhāgakkhaṇe vā, vikkhambhanappahānena ucchinnamūlā jhānakkhaṇe. “Vivicceva
analyzed: jhānassa pubbabhāga kkhaṇe vā vikkhambhana ppahānena ucchinna mūlā jhāna kkhaṇe vivicca iva

original: kāmehī”ti hi vuttaṃ. Samucchedappahānena tālāvatthukatā tatiyavijjādhigamakkhaṇe.
analyzed: kāmehi iti hi vuttam samuccheda ppahānena tālā vatthuka tā tatiya vijjā adhigama kkhaṇe

original: Itthambhūtā pana te rūparasādayo anabhāvaṃkatā āyatimanuppādadhammāti ekamevidaṃ
analyzed: ittham bhūtā pana te rūpa rasa ādayaḥ anabhāvaṃkatāḥ āyatimanuppāda dhammāḥ ti ekam eva idam

analyzed: attha padam paṭhamāya vā abhinibbhidāya pahīnā dutiyāya ucchinna mūlā tatiyāya tālāvatthuka tā

original: Lokiyamaggena vā pahīnā, dassanamaggena ucchinnamūlā, tividhena bhāvanāmaggena tālāvatthukatātiādi.

analyzed: nigamana vacanam tam kimattham ti ce gāmam sandhāya yathā vutta padattha sambhava dassana attham

original: “So pana gāmo tadupacārena evaṃ nāmaṃ labhatī”ti vacanaṃ pana avuttasiddhanti katvā
analyzed: saḥ pana gāmaḥ tad upacārena evam nāmam labhati iti vacanam pana a vutta siddhanti katvā

original: na vuttanti veditabbaṃ, atha vā yassa “uruvelā”ti yathāvuttavālikarāsissa, tassa
analyzed: na vuttam ti veditabbam atha vā yassa uru velā ati yathā vutta vālika rāsissa tassa

original: samīpagāmassapi nāmaṃ. Tattha āyasmā upālitthero na idha gāmaṃ sandhāya “uruvelāyaṃ
analyzed: samīpa gāmassa api nāmam tattha āyasmai upāli ttheraḥ naḥ idha gāmam sandhāya uru velāyam

original: viharatī”ti āha gocaragāmapayojanābhāvato. Na hi bhagavā taṃ gāmaṃ gocaraṃ katvā
analyzed: viharati iti āha gocara gāma payojana abhāvataḥ na hi bhagavā tam gāmam gocaram katvā

original: tadā tattha vihāsi, tasmā ettha vālikarāsissa samīpe bodhirukkhamūle vihāraṃ sandhāya
analyzed: tadā tattha vihāsi tasmai ettha vālika rāsissa samīpe bodhi rukkha mūle vihāram sandhāya

original: so evamāhāti dassetukāmo aṭṭhakathācariyo evamāhāti veditabbaṃ, tasmā bhagavato gāmato
analyzed: saḥ evam āha ati dassetu kāmo aṭṭhakathā cariyaḥ evam āha ati veditabbam tasmai bhagavato gāmataḥ

original: dūratare araññe abhisambodhidīpanena dutiyuppattiṭṭhānaniyamaṃ tīhi padehi akāsi
analyzed: dūratare araññe abhisambodhi dīpanena dutiya uppatti ṭṭhāna niyamam tīhi padehi akāsi

original: theroti veditabbaṃ, aññathā padattayavacanapayojanābhāvato. Tattha nadantā gacchatīti
analyzed: therā ti veditabbam aññathā tattha nadantā gacchati iti

original: nadī. Nelañjalāyāti vattabbe la-kārassa ra-kāraṃ katvā “nerañjarāyā”ti vuttaṃ, kaddamasevālavirahitattā
analyzed: nadī nelañjalāya iti vattabbe lakārassa rakāram katvā nerañjarāya iti vuttam

original: niddosajalāyāti attho, nīlajalāyāti tassā nāmameva vā etaṃ.
analyzed: niddosa jalāya ati atthaḥ nīla jalāya ati tassāḥ nāmam eva vai etam

original: Bodhirukkhamūleti ettha ca bodhi vuccati abhisambodho. So ca atthato bhagavato catutthamaggañāṇaṃ
analyzed: bodhi rukkha mūlā iti ettha ca bodhi vuccati abhisambodho so ca atthataḥ bhagavato catuttha magga ñāṇam

original: hoti “vimokkhantikametaṃ nāma”nti paṭisambhidāvacanato. Kiñcāpi taṃ nāmakaraṇabhūtaṃ
analyzed: hoti vimokkha antikam etam nāma nti paṭisambhidā vacanato kiñca api tam nāmakaraṇa bhūtam

original: catutthaphalañāṇampi vattuṃ sambhavati, kattabbakiccānaṃ pana karaṇato taṃ catutthamaggañāṇameva
analyzed: catuttha phala ñāṇam pi vattum sambhavati kattabba kiccānam pana karaṇataḥ tam catuttha magga ñāṇam eva

original: ettha bodhīti veditabbaṃ. Teneva pāḷiyaṃ “tatiyavijjāya āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyā”ti tadeva
analyzed: ettha bodhi iti veditabbam tena iva pāḷiyam tatiya vijjāya āsavānam khaya ñāṇāya ati tat eva

original: dassitaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “bojjhaṅgā”ti, “bodhipakkhiyā dhammā”ti ca. Tattha yasmā
analyzed: dassitam aṭṭhakathāyam pana bojjhaṅgā ati bodhi pakkhiyāḥ dhammā ati ca tattha yasmā

original: catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ “bodhī”ti vuccati, tasmā sāmaññato vattukāmatādhippāyavasena
analyzed: catūsu maggesu ñāṇam bodhi iti vuccati tasmā sāmaññataḥ vattu kāma tā adhippāya vasena

original: “bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ idhādhippetañāṇassapi tadantogadhattā.
analyzed: bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇan ti vuttam idha adhippeta ñāṇassa api tad anta gadha tā

original: Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ bhagavato ādimaggattayavacanassa vuttaṭṭhānābhāvā catutthamaggañāṇameva
analyzed: atha vā pāḷiyam bhagavataḥ ādi magga ttaya vacanassa vutta ṭṭhāna abhāvā catuttha magga ñāṇam eva

analyzed: bhagavataḥ uppannam na bhagavā sotāpanna ādi bhāvam patvā buddhaḥ jātaḥ iti samaya antara ppasaṅga nivāraṇa attham

original: “catūsū”ti vuttaṃ ādittayassa catutthaupanissayasambhavena bodhipariyāyasiddhito.

original: “Puggalopi senāsanampi upanissayapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato phalahetuko phalajanako
analyzed: puggalaḥ pi senāsanam pi upanissaya paccayena paccayaḥ ti vacanato phala hetuko phala janako

original: rukkho phalarukkhoti viya bodhiheturukkho bodhirukkhoti veditabbo. Ettha “yasmā kevalaṃ
analyzed: rukkhaḥ phala rukkhaḥ iti viya bodhi hetu rukkhaḥ bodhi rukkhaḥ iti veditabbaḥ ettha yasmā kevalam

original: bodhīti rukkhassapi nāmaṃ, tasmā bodhī”ti parato vuttaṃ. Nigrodhādirukkhato assa
analyzed: bodhi iti rukkhassa api nāmam tasmai bodhi iti paratas vuttam nigrodha ādi rukkhataḥ assa

original: visesanavacanaṃ pana tadaññabodhimūlappasaṅganivāraṇatthaṃ. Maggañāṇañhi kusalamūlattā
analyzed: visesana vacanam pana tad añña bodhi mūla ppasaṅga nivāraṇa attham magga ñāṇam hi kusala mūla ttā

original: bodhi ca taṃ mūlañcāti saṅkhyaṃ labheyya. Paṭhamābhisambuddho nisīdatīti sambandho.
analyzed: bodhi ca tam mūlam ca ati saṅkhyam labheyya paṭhama abhisambuddhaḥ nisīdati iti sambandhaḥ

original: Tena abhisambuddhadivasena saddhiṃ aṭṭhāhaṃ ekapallaṅkena nisinnabhāvaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: tena abhisambuddha divasena saddhim aṭṭhāham eka pallaṅkena nisinna bhāvam dasseti

original: Ettha eka-saddo tassa nisajjāsaṅkhātassa pabbajjānuyogānurūpassa pallaṅkassa aññena
analyzed: ettha eka saddaḥ tassa nisajjā saṅkhātassa pabbajjā anuyoga anurūpassa pallaṅkassa aññena

original: iriyāpathena anantariyabhāvaṃ athassa akopitabhāvaṃ dasseti. Vimuttisukhanti ettha
analyzed: iriyāpathena anantariya bhāvam athassa a kopita bhāvam dasseti vimutti sukham ti ettha

original: vimuttiyaṃ vā sukhanti na sambhavati. Pañcamajjhānikattā bhagavato phalasamāpattisaṅkhātā
analyzed: vimuttiyam vā na sambhavati pañcamajjhānika ttā bhagavato phala samāpatti saṅkhātā

original: vimutti eva anujaṅghanaṭṭhena nibbānasukhanti vimuttisukhaṃ, taṃ samāpajjanena paṭisaṃvedī
analyzed: vimutti eva anujaṅghana ṭhena nibbāna sukhanti vimutti sukham tam samāpajjanena paṭisaṃvedī

original: anubhavanto nisīdi. Veneyyakālānatikkamanato taṃ apekkhamāno nisīdi, na vimuttisukhasaṅgena.
analyzed: anubhavantaḥ nisīdi veneyya kāla an atikkamanataḥ tam apekkhamāno nisīdi na vimutti sukha saṅgena

original: Atha khoti adhikārantarārambhe nipātadvayaṃ. Tena vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedayamāno
analyzed: atha kho iti adhikāra antara ārambhe nipāta dvayam tena vimutti sukham paṭisaṃvedayamānaḥ

original: na paṭiccasamuppādaṃ manasākāsi, kintu tato vuṭṭhāyāti dasseti. Paṭivedhavaseneva
analyzed: na paṭiccasamuppādam manasā akāsi kintu tatas vuṭṭhāya ati dasseti paṭivedha vasena iva

original: sumanasikatassa paṭiccasamuppādassa punappunaṃ manasikaraṇaṃ gambhīrattā assādajananato,
analyzed: su manasikatassa paṭiccasamuppādassa punappunam manasikaraṇam gambhīra ttā assāda jananataḥ

original: na apubbanayadassanādhippāyato. Paccakkhabhūtasabbadhammattā bhagavato asammohato,
analyzed: na apubba naya dassana adhippāyataḥ paccakkha bhūta sabba dhamma ttā bhagavataḥ asammohato

original: paṭividdhassa visayato vā manasikaraṇaṃ pana vijitadesapaccavekkhaṇaṃ viya rañño
analyzed: paṭividdhassa visayataḥ vā manasikaraṇam pana vijita desa paccavekkhaṇam viya rañño

original: apubbaṃ pītiṃ janeti. Vuttañhi “amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato”ti. Rattiyā
analyzed: apubbam pītim janeti vuttam hi amānusī ratī hoti sammā dhammam vipassato ti rattiyā

original: paṭhamaṃ yāmanti accantasaṃyogavasena upayogavacanaṃ, tena tassa vikappanānattataṃ
analyzed: paṭhamam yāmanti accanta saṃyoga vasena upayoga vacanam tena tassa

original: dasseti. Kiñcāpi “anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasākāsī”ti ekatova vuttaṃ, tathāpi iminā anukkamenāti
analyzed: dasseti kiñcā api anuloma paṭilomam manasā akāsi iti ekatas vat vuttam tathā api iminā anukkamena ati

original: dassanatthaṃ “avijjāpaccayā”tiādi. Tattha ca kiñcāpi pavattimattapaccavekkhaṇā adhippetā
analyzed: dassana ttham avijjā paccayā tiādi tattha ca kiñcā api pavattimatta paccavekkhaṇā adhippetā

original: kathaṃ paññāyatīti? Paṭhamabhāvāya, paṭilomamanasikaraṇaṃ pana anulome paccayānaṃ,
analyzed: katham paññāyati iti paṭhama bhāvāya paṭiloma manasikaraṇam pana anulome paccayānam

original: paccayuppannānañca tathābhāvasādhanatthaṃ. Yasmā avijjāya eva nirodhā saṅkhāranirodho,
analyzed: paccaya uppannānam ca tathābhāva sādhana ttham yasmai avijjāya eva saṅkhāra nirodho

original: na aññathā, tasmā saṅkhārānaṃ avijjā paccayo, tassā ca saṅkhārā phalanti dīpanato.
analyzed: na aññathā tasmā saṅkhārānaṃ avijjā paccayaḥ tassā ca saṅkhārā phalanti dīpanato

original: Tathā nibbānapaccavekkhaṇāya anulomamanasikaraṇaṃ kāraṇanirodhā phalanirodhasādhanatthaṃ.
analyzed: tathā nibbāna paccavekkhaṇāya anuloma manasikaraṇam kāraṇa nirodhā phala nirodha sādhana ttham

original: Ettha ca anubhāvato nibbānaṃ dassitaṃ. Na hi taṃ avijjādinirodhamattanti. Tattha
analyzed: ettha ca anubhāvato nibbānam dassitam na hi tam avijjā ādi nirodha mattan ti tattha

original: “yato khayaṃ paccayānaṃ avedī”ti vacanena anulomo nādhippetoti siddhaṃ. Maggapaccavekkhaṇāya

analyzed: vattabbam natthi ubhayattha api kiccataḥ ārammaṇato ca tassa maggassa visayato ca

original: tattha maggo dassito.
analyzed: tattha maggaḥ dassito

analyzed: tattha āha paṭicca samuppādam paṭilomam manasā akāsi iti na yujjati na hi paṭiloma apadesena

original: niddiṭṭhaṃ nibbānaṃ paṭiccasamuppādo bhavitumarahatīti? Vuccate – na, tadatthajānanato.
analyzed: niddiṭṭham nibbānam paṭiccasamuppādaḥ bhavitum arahati iti vuccate na tad attha jānanataḥ

original: Anulomapaṭilomanti hi bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ. Anulomato, paṭilomato ca taṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
analyzed: anuloma paṭilomanti hi bhāva napuṃsakam anulomatas paṭilomatas ca tam paṭiccasamuppādam

original: manasākāsīti hi tattha attho. Aññathā nirodhassa paṭilomappasaṅgāpattiyevāpajjati.
analyzed: manasā akāsi iti hi tattha atthaḥ aññathā nirodhassa paṭiloma ppasaṅga āpattiyā iva āpajjati

original: Paṭilome ca panetasmiṃ anukkamaniyamo anulome anukkamaniyamato siddhoti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: paṭilome ca pana etasmin anukkama niyamaḥ anulome anukkama niyamataḥ siddhaḥ iti veditabbam

original: Evaṃ sati paṭiccasamuppādassa paṭilomo nāma apaṭiccasamuppādoti siddhaṃ hoti. Tena
analyzed: evam sati paṭiccasamuppādassa paṭilomaḥ nāma apaṭiccasamuppādaḥ ti siddham hoti tena

original: vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nirodho hotīti anuppādo hotī”tiādi. Evaṃ sante pubbāparavirodho
analyzed: vuttam aṭṭhakathā ayam nirodhaḥ hoti iti anuppādaḥ hoti itiādi evam sante pubba apara virodho

original: hoti. Kathaṃ? Paṭiccāti hi iminā phalassa paccayapariggahena, paccayānañca paccayāyattupagamanena
analyzed: hoti katham paṭicca ati hi iminā phalassa paccaya pariggahena paccaya anañca paccaya āyatta upagamanena

original: tassa uppādābhimukhabhāvadīpanato asamuppādo na sambhavati, tasmā apaṭiccasamuppādoti
analyzed: tassa uppāda abhimukha bhāva dīpanataḥ asamuppādaḥ na sambhavati tasmai a paṭiccasamuppādaḥ ti

analyzed: evam ubhaya paṭikkhepena pana assa paṭiloma tā veditabbā ati eke tam ayuttam tassa anuloma bhāva niyamanato

original: atthātisayābhāvato, tasmā appaṭiccasamuppādo tassa paṭilomoti veditabbaṃ. Teneva
analyzed: attha atisaya abhāvato tasmā appaṭiccasamuppādo tassa paṭilomaḥ ti veditabbam tena iva

original: bhagavatā pāḷiyaṃ paccayapaccayuppannanirodho vutto. Tattha hi “avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā”ti
analyzed: bhagavatā pāḷiyam paccaya paccaya uppanna nirodhaḥ vuttaḥ tattha hi avijjāya tu eva asesa virāga nirodhā ti

original: evaṃ paccayassa samucchinnapaccayabhāvavasena paccayanirodhaṃ, phalassa paccayapaṭiggahābhāvavasena
analyzed: evam paccayassa samucchinna paccaya bhāva vasena paccaya nirodham phalassa paccaya paṭiggaha abhāva vasena

original: paccayuppannanirodhañca dīpeti. Duvidho pāḷiyaṃ nirodho atthato anuppādo nāma hotīti
analyzed: paccaya uppanna nirodham ca dīpeti duvidhaḥ pāḷiyam nirodho atthataḥ anuppādaḥ nāma hoti iti

original: katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “nirodho hotīti anuppādo hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sante nibbānaṃ
analyzed: katvā aṭṭhakathā ayam nirodhaḥ hoti iti anuppādaḥ hoti iti vuttam evam sante nibbānam

original: paccayapaccayuppannānaṃ nirodhamattanti āpajjatīti ce? Na, tassānubhāvadīpanādhippāyato.
analyzed: paccaya paccaya uppannānam nirodha mattanti āpajjati iti ce na tassa anubhāva dīpana adhippāyato

original: Viditavelāyanti manasikatavelāyanti attho, aññathā tato pubbe aviditappasaṅgato.
analyzed: viditavelāyanti manasikatavelāyanti atthaḥ aññathā tatas pubbe avidita ppasaṅgato

original: Jhāyatoti ettha kāmaṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena jhāyato bodhipakkhiyadhammā pātubhavanti,
analyzed: jhāyataḥ ti ettha kāmam lakkhaṇa upanijjhānena jhāyataḥ bodhi pakkhiya dhammā pātubhavanti

original: catuariyasaccadhammā vā pakāsanti, tathāpi pubbabhāge samathādiyānikavibhāgadassanatthaṃ
analyzed: catu ariya sacca dhammāḥ vā pakāsanti tathā api pubba bhāge samatha ādi yānika vibhāga dassana ttham

original: ārammaṇūpanijjhānaggahaṇaṃ. Catusaccadhammaggahaṇaṃ kāmaṃ anulomapaṭiccasamuppādadassanādhikārena
analyzed: ārammaṇa upanijjhāna ggahaṇam catu sacca dhamma ggahaṇam kāmam anuloma paṭiccasamuppāda dassana adhikārena

original: virujjhati, tathāpi “yo dukkhaṃ parijānāti, so samudayaṃ pajahatī”ti laddhivasena katanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: virujjhati tathā api yaḥ dukkham parijānāti saḥ samudayam pajahati iti laddhi vasena katam ti veditabbam

original: 2. “Paccayakkhayassā”ti kiccapariyāyavasena vuttaṃ. Tena paccayanibbānaṃ, tadupanissayanibbānañcāti
analyzed: paccaya kkhayassa ati kicca pariyāya vasena vuttam tena paccaya nibbānam tad upanissaya nibbānam ca ati

original: duvidhaṃ nibbānaṃ dassitaṃ hotīti. Kāmañca taṃ na kevalaṃ paccayakkhayamattaṃ karoti,
analyzed: duvidham nibbānam dassitam hoti iti kāmam ca tam na kevalam paccaya khaya mattam karoti

original: atha kho paccayuppannakkhayampi karoti. Yato ubhinnampi nirodho dassito, tathāpi
analyzed: atha kho paccaya uppanna khayam pi karoti yatas ubhinnam pi nirodhaḥ dassitaḥ tathā api

original: hetunirodhā phalanirodhoti katvā “paccayakkhayassā”ti vuttaṃ. Vuttappakārā dhammāti
analyzed: hetu nirodhā phala nirodho ti katvā paccaya khayassa ati vuttam vutta ppakārāḥ dhammā ti

original: ettha catusaccaggahaṇaṃ paṭhamagāthāyaṃ vuttanayavipallāsena katanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ettha catu sacca ggahaṇam paṭhama gāthāyam vutta naya vipallāsena katam iti veditabbam

original: 3. Samudayanirodhasaṅkhāto atthoti ettha samudayo kiccavasena, nirodho ārammaṇakiriyāya.
analyzed: samudaya nirodha saṅkhātaḥ atthaḥ ti ettha samudayaḥ kicca vasena nirodhaḥ ārammaṇa kiriyāya

original: Etena dvippakārā nirodhā dassitā honti tassa anubhāvassa vasenāti attho. Yasmā pallaṅkābhujitaṭṭhānañca
analyzed: etena dvippakārāḥ nirodhāḥ dassitāḥ honti tassa anubhāvassa vasena ati atthaḥ yasmā pallaṅka ābhujita ṭṭhānam ca

original: “pallaṅko”ti vuccati, tasmā phalādhigamaṭṭhānaṃ “pallaṅka”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pallaṅko ti vuccati tasmā phala adhigama ṭṭhānam pallaṅkanti vuttam

original: Ajapālakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: ajapāla kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 4. Sammodīti hitakāmatāya bhagavā tena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ sammodi. Vedehi antanti
analyzed: sammodi iti hita kāmatāya bhagavā tena brāhmaṇena saddhim sammodi

original: ettha nibbānaṃ anto nāma. Vedānaṃ vā antaṃ gatattāti ettha arahattaṃ. Tattha paṭhamena
analyzed: ettha nibbānam antaḥ nāma vedānam vā antam gata ttā ati ettha arahattam tattha paṭhamena

original: vedantagū yasmā, tasmā eva vusitabrahmacariyo. Dutiyena vedantagū yasmā, tasmā vusitabrahmacariyoti
analyzed: vedantagū yasmai tasmai eva vusita brahmacariyaḥ dutiyena vedantagū yasmai tasmai vusita brahmacariyaḥ uti

original: evaṃ yojanā kātabbā. Kiñcāpi brāhmaṇassa catusaccayuttaṃ atthato vuttaṃ, udānagāthāyaṃ
analyzed: evam yojanā kātabbā kiñcā api brāhmaṇassa catu sacca yuttam atthataḥ vuttam udāna gāthāyaṃ

original: vuttapaṭivedhābhāvaṃ sandhāya “dhammacakkappavattana”nti vuccatīti parihāro.
analyzed: vutta paṭivedha abhāvam sandhāya dhamma cakka ppavattananti vuccati iti parihāraḥ

original: Ajapālakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ajapāla kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: saddhādayo paramavisuddhā nāma samannārakkhattā. Iti satipi saddhādīhi vuttā hoti.

original: Evaṃ sante ettha vutte catubbidhe sīle pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ saddhā maṇḍeti. Saddhāsādhanañhi
analyzed: evam sante ettha vutte catubbidhe sīle pātimokkha saṃvara sīlam saddhā maṇḍeti saddhā sādhanam hi

original: taṃ. Indriyasaṃvarājīvapārisuddhipaccayaparibhogasīlāni paṭimaṇḍenti sativīriyapaññāyoti
analyzed: tam indriya saṃvara ājīva pārisuddhi paccaya paribhoga sīlāni paṭimaṇḍenti sati vīriya paññāyā ti

original: yathāyogaṃ veditabbaṃ. Apica saddhā ca buddhirahitā avisuddhā hoti buddhiyā pasādahetuttā.
analyzed: yathāyogam veditabbam apica saddhā ca buddhi rahitā avisuddhā hoti buddhiyā pasāda hetuttā

original: Buddhiyo pana tassānubhāvena paramavisuddhā nāma honti. Paññā saddhārahitā kerāṭikapakkhaṃ

original: bhajati, saddhāyuttā eva visuddhā hoti. Vīriyañca samādhirahitaṃ uddhaccāya saṃvattati,

original: na samādhiyuttanti vīriyassa suddhavacanato samādhipi vutto hoti, evaṃ paramavisuddhā

analyzed: ca saddhā pavatti vitthārataḥ ñātabbā sīla vipatti sampatti nimittam ādīnava mānisaṃsam ca

original: ādīnavapariccāge, ānisaṃsasampādane ca upāyaṃ disvā tathā pavattamānā paññā pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ

analyzed: paṭimaṇḍeti ati sītam iti ādinā a pavattana araham kosajjam yaḥ ca sītam ca uṇham ca ati

original: Catunnampi saṅgahavatthūnaṃ anukūlasamudācāro idha ācāroti veditabbo. Ajjava-vacanena

analyzed: hita ajjhāsaya ādīni dīpitāni honti ādi saddena khanti ca soraccam ca sākhalyam ca paṭisanthāro
